channel.title: Publications on VMC
channel.description: Recent content in Publications on VMC

item.title: Publications List
item.description: Please refer to the paper below when publishing results base on simulations with VMC: Reference paper Hřivnáčová I et al: The Virtual MonteCarlo, ECONF C0303241:THJT006,2003; e-Print: cs.SE/0306005 All publications listed in time reversed order: New Developments in the VMC Project, I Hřivnáčová, B Volkel 2020 EPJ Web Conf. Volume 245 02005 doi: 10.1051/epjconf/202024502005 Using multiple engines in the Virtual Monte Carlo package, B Volkel et al 2020 EPJ Web Conf. Volume 245 02008
